sen.j: 河原町通（かわらまちどおり）は京都市の通りのひとつ。
sen.e: The Kawaramachi-dori Street is a street in Kyoto City.
Kawaramachi-dori Street is located in Kyoto City.
Kawaramachi-dori Street is one of the streets located in Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: one of the 入れました。

sen.j: 南北の通り。
sen.e: It runs north-south.
It runs north-south.
It runs north-south.

sen.j: 平安京の域外。
sen.e: It was outside Heiankyo.
It was outside Heiankyo.
It is located outside of Heian-kyo.

sen.j: 豊臣秀吉の御土居の東の外をほぼ沿うように走る。
sen.e: It runs as if it follows the east outer edge of Construction of Odoi Fortress built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.
It runs as if it were following the east outer edge of the construction of Odoi Fortress, built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.
It runs as if it were following the east outer edge of the construction of Odoi Fortress, built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.

sen.j: 江戸時代初期に市街地が鴨川 (淀川水系)まで拡大された際に開通した。
sen.e: It was opened in the Edo era when the downtown expanded to the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system).
It was opened during the Edo period, when the downtown expanded to the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa Water System).
It was opened during the early Edo period when the downtown expanded to the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River System).

sen.j: 北は葵橋西詰から南は十条通まで。
sen.e: It extends from Aoibashi-Nishizume in the north to the Jujo-dori Street in the south.
It extends from Aoibashi-Nishizume in the north to Jujo-dori Street in the south.
It extends from Aoibashi-Nishizume in the north to Jujo-dori Street in the south.

sen.j: 葵橋西詰以北は下鴨本通と名前を変える。
sen.e: North from Aoibashi-Nishizume, the street has a different name; Shimogamo-hon-dori Street.
North from Aoibashi-Nishizume, the street has a different name: Shimogamo-hon-dori Street.
North from Aoibashi-Nishizume, the street has a different name: Shimogamo-hon-dori Street.

sen.j: 三条通から四条通にかけては京都の中心繁華街となり、歩道にはアーケードが設けられている。
sen.e: The area along the street between the Sanjo-dori Street and the Shijo-dori street is Kyoto's central shopping and entertainment district with pedestrian paths covered by an arcade.
The area along the street between Sanjo-dori Street and Shijo-dori Street is Kyoto's central shopping and entertainment district, having pedestrian paths covered by an arcade.
The area along the street between Sanjo-dori Street and Shijo-dori Street is Kyoto's central shopping and entertainment district, having pedestrian paths covered by an arcade.

sen.j: 四条通り以南では、鴨川と並行に北北東－南南西方向に通りが存在する。
sen.e: The street south of the Shijo-dori Street runs north-northeast and then south-southwest paralleling the Kamo-gawa River.
The street south of Shijo-dori Street runs north-northeast and then south-southwest in parallel with the Kamo-gawa River.
The street south of Shijo-dori Street runs north-northeast and then south-southwest in parallel with the Kamo-gawa River.

sen.j: そのため、純粋に南北方向に走っている寺町通・御幸町通とは交差している。
sen.e: Thus it intersects the Teramachi-dori Street and the Gokomachi-dori Street, which run completely north-south.
Thus it intersects Teramachi-dori Street and Gokomachi-dori Street, which run completely north-south.
Thus it intersects Teramachi-dori Street and Gokomachi-dori Street, which run completely north-south.

sen.j: 御池通から四条通までが、路上喫煙等禁止区域である。
sen.e: The street between the Oike-dori Street and the Shijo-dori Street is a Public Nonsmoking Area.
The street between Oike-dori Street and Shijo-dori Street is a public nonsmoking area.
The street between Oike-dori Street and Shijo-dori Street is a public nonsmoking area.

sen.j: 塩小路通から北は京都市電の河原町線が1978年まで走っていた。
sen.e: Kawaramachi Line of Kyoto Municipal Streetcar ran north from the Shiokoji-dori Street until 1978.
The Kawaramachi Line of Kyoto Municipal Streetcar ran north from Shiokoji-dori Street until 1978.
The Kawaramachi Line of Kyoto City Trams ran north from Shiokoji-dori Street until 1978.
sen.cmt: Kyoto City Trams としました。

sen.j: 四条通から北上して御池通までは祇園祭の山鉾巡行の経路。
sen.e: In Gion Festival, Yamahoko Junko (procession of Gion Festival Floats) goes along this street north from the shijo-dori Street to the Oike-dori Street.
In the Gion Festival, Yamahoko Junko (procession of Gion Festival Floats) goes along this street north from Shijo-dori Street to Oike-dori Street.
In the Gion Festival, Yamahoko Junko (procession of Gion Festival Floats) goes along this street north from Shijo-dori Street to Oike-dori Street.

sen.j: 交差する道路などの特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
